Literature.Title: Design, crystal structure and atomic force microscopy study of thioether ligated d,l-cyclic antimicrobial peptides against multidrug resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
Literature.Author: He R, Di Bonaventura I, Visini R, Gan BH, Fu YV, Probst D, Lüscher A, Köhler T, van Delden C, Stocker A, Hong W, Darbre T, Reymond JL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis BR151(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM1.A(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM9.A(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PEJ2.6(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PEJ9.1(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus COL(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>64µg/ml)
